entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:27 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
